message.original: うおおお！ 海はいつ見ても広いですね！ なぜか心湧きたちます！
message.translation: "Ooh! The sea is vast and wide even when you see it!"

message.original: ローテスに近い北の浜辺と 谷を隔てた南の浜辺は敵もかなり違うとか 海岸沿いを探検しましょう！
message.translation: "The northern beach near Rothes and the southern beach across the Valley have different enemies that dwell there. We should explore the coast!"

message.original: たまに漂流船や魔物の死体が 浜辺に流れ着くそうです 何か使えるものが見つかるかもしれませんよ！
message.translation: "Much washes up upon the shore. We may find something useful."

message.original: ブリアの灯台上は見晴らしが良さそうです 落下注意ですが――！！
message.translation: "The view of Breya's lighthouse is beautiful even though it is falling apart."

message.original: 岸壁付近はハーピーがよく群れていますね フンが降ってこないとよいのですがっ――！
message.translation: "Harpies are rampant there. We must tread carefully!"
